abstract: Britain's Conservative Party narrows choice to succeed Prime Min David Cameron down to home secretary Theresa May and junior energy minister Andrea Leadsom; winner will be country's first female prime minister since Margaret Thatcher, and will confront challenge of leading country after its vote to leave European Union.

headline.print_headline: A Woman Will Lead Britain for 1st Time Since Thatcher
headline.main: Race for Britain’s Prime Minister Down to Theresa May and Andrea Leadsom

snippet: Ms. May, the home secretary, or Ms. Leadsom, an energy minister, will become the first woman to lead Britain since Margaret Thatcher resigned in 1990....
lead_paragraph: Ms. May, the home secretary, or Ms. Leadsom, an energy minister, will become the first woman to lead Britain since Margaret Thatcher resigned in 1990.
